column1: # "hades" remix - contains all the packages required by the "mapgen_hades" package
# That package is a simplistic implementation of PFAA Geologica's geology system, partly based on
#   the underground challenge (underch) mod, but with a completely new set of stones and ores, which
#   are placed in a semi-realistic way, making no effort to reproduce strata, pipes or other
#   real-world geological formations (as PFAA tried to do). As in underch, each underground biome
#   (pseudo-biome) has a characteristic basic stone, each with a characteristic set of ores
# The "mapgen_hades" package includes a number of optional settings. Most of them are disabled by
#   default. If you edit the package code to enable them, you should also uncomment all of the
#   packages in the corresponding sections below
# Note that, if you do this, you'll see some duplicate package warnings. The folder that contains
#   this file, also contains the file "packages_ALL_DEPENDENCIES.csv", which assumes that all the
#   optional settings have been enabled. In that file, only duplicate packages are commented out
# If you have enabled all of the optional settings, you should rename this file (to anything), and
# metal packages required by non-optional mineral packages
# ugbc stones which have sandstone, clay, gravel and sand equivalents
# To add these packages, uncomment them, and then in the "mapgen_hades" package, set the flag
# optional minerals, not listed above, which provide all remaining metals that can be obtained from
# To add these packages, uncomment them, and then in the "mapgen_hades" package, set the flag

# If the "add_real_minerals_extra_flag" is also enabled, these packages must be uncommented
